name: Christmas Dip
author: Darwin
summary: A creamy layered dip that looks beautiful, especially at Christmas, with layers of green pistachios and dried cranberries.
directions: Reserve 1 tablespoon of dried cranberries and pistachios for garnish
Combine remaining dried cranberries and pistachio nuts in a small bowl
Line a small round mixing bowl with plastic wrap
Beat together cream cheese, butter, blue cheese, and Brie in a bowl until smooth
Spread 1/3 of cheese mixture evenly in the bottom of the plastic wrap-lined bowl
Layer 1/3 of the cranberry-nut mixture over the cheese
Layer cheese mixture with berry-nut mixture twice more, ending with a layer of cranberry-pistachio mixture
Cover the bowl with more wrap, pressing the wrap down onto the spread to compress it
To serve, take plastic wrap off the top of the bowl and turn the layered dip out onto a serving dish
Remove remaining plastic wrap, and sprinkle reserved cranberries and pistachios around the spread to garnish
